backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the SurgiPaw production publish feature to its associated files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app manifest, icons, theme color, and the React entry point script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first PWA strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and exclusions for authentication and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header with login controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG workflow icon component depicting a petri dish with bacterial colonies, supporting an isCompleted prop for visual completion state.
SVG workflow icon component depicting a calendar page with date lines, using the navy blue dailySummary color token and supporting an isCompleted prop.
SVG workflow icon component depicting a document with a checkmark for discharge notes, supporting an isCompleted prop.
SVG workflow icon component depicting a circular refresh/clock arrow for follow-up tasks, supporting an isCompleted prop.
SVG workflow icon component depicting a side-view microscope for histopathology tasks, supporting an isCompleted prop.
Renders an imaging workflow icon using an x-ray bone image with an optional gray X overlay when the task is completed.
Renders a test tube SVG icon for the labs workflow step, with optional completed state via WorkflowIconBase.
Renders a speech-bubble SVG icon for the PDVM Notified workflow step using WorkflowIconBase.
Renders a scalpel SVG icon for the surgery report workflow step using WorkflowIconBase.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Dispatcher component that maps a workflowType string to the corresponding workflow icon component.
Base wrapper for workflow SVG icons that applies consistent sizing/stroke and overlays a gray X when isCompleted is true.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Exports shared design tokens for workflow icons: per-type colors, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration for all workflow task types and exports helper functions to derive selected, remaining, and completed checklist items from a Task object.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Compact card component for calendar views that displays a surgery case's pet info, complaint, and clickable workflow task icons with toggle-completion support.
Expandable card component for a surgery case showing species, patient details, workflow task icons with toggle support, and edit/delete actions.
A dialog component for editing an existing surgery case, pre-populating form fields from the provided case data and submitting updates via the useUpdateCase mutation.
A dialog component for creating a new surgery case, with form fields for patient details and task checklist selections, submitting via the useCreateCase mutation.
The main list view for surgery cases, handling fetching, filtering by species/tasks/search, sorting, and rendering case cards along with controls for creating cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select component for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task type and completed status, persisting selections to sessionStorage.
Renders the selected checklist tasks for a surgery case as clickable icon buttons that toggle task completion state.
React component providing CSV import and export functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, progress tracking, and creating/updating cases via API mutations with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A controlled date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-formatting, validation, and a calendar popover picker.
Provides exportCasesToCsv and importCasesFromCsv functions to serialize surgery cases to CSV and parse/validate CSV files back into case data structures with error collection.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 18-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript row type, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports pure functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: Custom React hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Exports preprocessOcrText, which normalizes whitespace, corrects common OCR character errors, and removes artifacts from raw OCR text output.
Parses structured 'Label: Value' text line-by-line and maps recognized labels to CaseFormData fields, handling species, sex, dates, and string fields with voice input variations.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with incomplete tasks using a hidden iframe and the browser's native print dialog, with color-coded task badges.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases including remaining checklist tasks, with proper field escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings, plus text truncation.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV report output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by a query string, matching against case fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines the CaseFormData interface and constant option arrays for species and sex used in case forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields, date parsing (MM/DD/YYYY, ISO), date-to-nanoseconds conversion, and species/sex enum parsing utilities.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases in either a weekly calendar or list view, with filtering, sorting, search, and a new case creation dialog.
Weekly calendar React component that renders a 7-column grid of surgery cases grouped by arrival date, with week navigation controls.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/ca: Utility functions for the calendar view, including generating week day arrays, filtering cases by day, formatting week ranges, and checking if a week is current.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract and count remaining open checklist tasks across surgery cases, returning structured task item objects.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty settings view component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced version.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend data operations including cases, user profiles, dashboard, and tasks, using a direct actor factory that bypasses the broken access control initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines light-mode OKLCH CSS custom properties for the design system, including colors for UI elements like cards, charts, and domain-specific fields (patient name, species, complaint, notes).
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using `clsx` and `tailwind-merge`.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the `App` component with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file, likely a placeholder for jspdf-autotable type augmentations.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file, likely a placeholder for jsPDF type augmentations.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript module declaration for `tesseract.js`, defining interfaces and enums for OCR workers, recognition results, and configuration options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends the theme with custom fonts and border radii, and registers the `tailwindcss-animate` and `@tailwindcss/typography` plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current feature (publishing the SurgiPaw app draft to production) and configuration for the build planning process.
